original_title: Ein neuer Apparat zur Verh체tung von Kinobr채nden
overview: Demonstration of fire extinguisher that reduces the danger of a burning film. After ten seconds, the fire in a film roll is extinguished by the device. The film can be reused by unrolling and drying. Public and projectionists are no longer at risk.
title: Ein neuer Apparat zur Verh체tung von Kinobr채nden
